section.section:
The Corporation shall maintain:
its principal office in the State; and
a designated agent to accept service of process.
The Corporation shall file the name and address of the designated agent with the State Department of Assessments and Taxation.

text.section: The Corporation is exempt from any special tax, property tax, recordation tax, or transfer tax imposed by the State or a political subdivision of the State.
Except as otherwise provided in this title, the Corporation is not a unit or instrumentality of the State.
